description: Jobs, professions, workplace, and work-related activities

sentences.english: I work as a teacher at a primary school.
sentences.explanation: 'Travailler comme' = to work as. 'Une école primaire' = primary school.
'Commencer le travail' = to start work. Time expressions with 'à'.

sentences.english: He is a doctor at the hospital.
sentences.explanation: 'Être médecin' = to be a doctor. 'À l'hôpital' = at the hospital.

sentences.english: We have a meeting this afternoon.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir une réunion' = to have a meeting. 'Cet après-midi' = this afternoon.
'Répondre au téléphone' = to answer the phone. Office duties vocabulary.

sentences.english: I need to finish this report today.
sentences.explanation: 'Devoir finir' = must finish. 'Ce rapport' = this report. Work deadlines.

sentences.english: She works part-time in a restaurant.
sentences.explanation: 'À temps partiel' = part-time. 'Dans un restaurant' = in a restaurant.

sentences.english: The boss called an emergency meeting.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: a convoqué. 'Une réunion d'urgence' = emergency meeting.

sentences.english: I commute to work by train.
sentences.explanation: 'Aller au travail' = to go to work. 'En train' = by train. Commuting.
'Concevoir' = to design. 'De nouveaux bâtiments' = new buildings.
Passé composé passif: a été promue. 'Le mois dernier' = last month.

sentences.english: We work overtime during busy periods.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire des heures supplémentaires' = to work overtime. Work intensity vocabulary.
'Défendre ses clients' = to defend clients. Legal profession vocabulary.
'Avoir des vacances' = to have vacation. 'La semaine prochaine' = next week.

sentences.english: The chef cooks in the kitchen.
sentences.explanation: 'Le chef cuisine' = the chef cooks. Note: chef/cuisine can be confusing.
'Suivre des formations' = to attend training. Professional development.
'Le vendeur/la vendeuse' = salesperson. Customer service vocabulary.

sentences.english: I work from home twice a week.
sentences.explanation: 'Travailler de la maison' = to work from home. Remote work vocabulary.
Passé composé: a embauché. 'Embaucher' = to hire. Company actions.
'Gagner un salaire' = to earn a salary. Compensation vocabulary.
'Travailler de nuit' = to work night shifts. Healthcare scheduling.

sentences.english: I send emails to my colleagues.
sentences.explanation: 'Envoyer des emails' = to send emails. 'Mes collègues' = my colleagues.
'Le/la comptable' = accountant. 'Des rapports financiers' = financial reports.
'Les ressources humaines' = human resources. Department vocabulary.
'Le/la mécanicien(ne)' = mechanic. 'Réparer' = to repair.

sentences.english: I have a job interview tomorrow.
sentences.explanation: 'Un entretien d'embauche' = job interview. Job searching vocabulary.
'Voler sur des routes' = to fly routes. Aviation vocabulary.

sentences.english: We clock in at 8 AM sharp.
sentences.explanation: 'Pointer' = to clock in. 'À 8 heures précises' = at 8 AM sharp.
'La/le caissier/caissière' = cashier. 'Compter l'argent' = to count money.

sentences.english: I take breaks every two hours.
sentences.explanation: 'Prendre des pauses' = to take breaks. 'Toutes les deux heures' = every two hours.
'Le/la pompier' = firefighter. 'Sauver des vies' = to save lives.

sentences.english: She manages a team of five people.
sentences.explanation: 'Gérer une équipe' = to manage a team. Management vocabulary.
'Le/la plombier/plombière' = plumber. 'Les tuyaux' = pipes.
'Des horaires flexibles' = flexible hours. Modern work arrangements.
'Le/la dentiste' = dentist. 'Les dents des patients' = patients' teeth.
'Des échéances à respecter' = deadlines to meet. Work pressure vocabulary.
'Le/la bibliothécaire' = librarian. 'Organiser les livres' = to organize books.
'Soumettre ses frais' = to submit expenses. Business procedures.
'Le/la photographe' = photographer. 'Des photos de mariage' = wedding photos.
'Négocier des contrats' = to negotiate contracts. Business vocabulary.
'L'électricien(ne)' = electrician. 'Installer des câblages' = to install wiring.
'Assister aux réunions' = to attend meetings. 'Hebdomadaires' = weekly.
'L'agriculteur/agricultrice' = farmer. 'Cultiver des légumes' = to grow vegetables.

sentences.english: We use computers for most tasks.
sentences.explanation: 'Utiliser des ordinateurs' = to use computers. 'La plupart des tâches' = most tasks.
'Le/la coiffeur/coiffeuse' = hairdresser. 'Avec style' = stylishly.
'Collaborer avec' = to collaborate with. International work vocabulary.

sentences.english: The taxi driver knows the city well.
sentences.explanation: 'Le chauffeur de taxi' = taxi driver. 'Connaître bien' = to know well.
'Faire des présentations' = to give presentations. Business communication.

sentences.english: The janitor cleans the office building.
sentences.explanation: 'Le/la concierge' = janitor. 'L'immeuble de bureaux' = office building.
'Travailler sous pression' = to work under pressure. Work stress vocabulary.
'L'architecte' = architect. 'De beaux bâtiments' = beautiful buildings.
'Mener des études de marché' = to conduct market research. Business analysis.
'Le/la vétérinaire' = veterinarian. 'Les animaux malades' = sick animals.
'Organiser les fichiers' = to organize files. Office administration.

sentences.english: The baker starts work very early.
sentences.explanation: 'Le/la boulanger/boulangère' = baker. 'Très tôt' = very early.
'Analyser les données' = to analyze data. Financial analysis vocabulary.

sentences.english: The security guard patrols the building.
sentences.explanation: 'Le/la garde de sécurité' = security guard. 'Patrouiller' = to patrol.
'Des évaluations de performance' = performance reviews. 'Annuellement' = annually.
'Le/la journaliste' = journalist. 'Des articles d'actualité' = news articles.
'Mettre en place' = to implement. Company policy vocabulary.
'Le/la menuisier/menuisière' = carpenter. 'Sur mesure' = custom-made.
'Coordonner entre' = to coordinate between. Inter-departmental work.

sentences.english: The translator works with multiple languages.
sentences.explanation: 'Le/la traducteur/traductrice' = translator. 'Plusieurs langues' = multiple languages.
'Superviser le contrôle qualité' = to supervise quality control. Manufacturing vocabulary.
'Le/la fleuriste' = florist. 'Composer des bouquets' = to arrange bouquets.
'Participer à des séances de brainstorming' = to participate in brainstorming sessions.
'Le/la facteur/factrice' = mailman. 'Quotidiennement' = daily.
'Développer des applications' = to develop applications. IT vocabulary.
'Le/la serveur/serveuse' = waiter. 'Poliment' = politely.
'Maintenir des relations' = to maintain relationships. Professional networking.
'L'assistant(e) social(e)' = social worker. Community service vocabulary.
'Gérer les plaintes' = to handle complaints. Customer service challenges.
'L'artiste' = artist. 'Des peintures originales' = original paintings.
'Suivre l'avancement' = to track progress. Project management vocabulary.
'Le/la psychologue' = psychologist. Mental health profession vocabulary.
'Optimiser les processus' = to optimize processes. Business improvement.

sentences.english: The real estate agent shows houses.
sentences.explanation: 'L'agent immobilier' = real estate agent. Property showing vocabulary.
'Assister à des ateliers' = to attend workshops. Continuous learning.
'Le/la pharmacien(ne)' = pharmacist. Medication preparation vocabulary.
'Gérer les niveaux de stock' = to manage inventory levels. Supply chain vocabulary.
'Le/la guide du musée' = museum guide. Cultural education vocabulary.
'Rechercher les tendances' = to research trends. Market analysis vocabulary.
'Le/la maître-nageur/nageuse' = lifeguard. Pool safety vocabulary.
'Planifier les rendez-vous' = to schedule appointments. Administrative efficiency.
'Le/la bijoutier/bijoutière' = jeweler. Custom jewelry vocabulary.
'Résoudre les problèmes' = to resolve problems. Technical support vocabulary.

sentences.english: The tour guide speaks several languages.
sentences.explanation: 'Le/la guide touristique' = tour guide. Multilingual skills vocabulary.
'Coordonner les activités bénévoles' = to coordinate volunteer activities.
'L'horloger/horlogère' = watchmaker. Antique repair vocabulary.
'Évaluer la performance' = to evaluate performance. HR management vocabulary.
'L'entraîneur/entraîneuse sportif(ve)' = sports coach. Athletic training vocabulary.
'Surveiller les standards' = to monitor standards. Quality assurance vocabulary.

sentences.english: The wine expert tastes different varieties.
sentences.explanation: 'L'expert en vin' = wine expert. Wine tasting vocabulary.
'Faciliter les réunions' = to facilitate meetings. Meeting leadership vocabulary.

sentences.english: The antique dealer authenticates old items.
sentences.explanation: 'L'antiquaire' = antique dealer. Authentication vocabulary.
'Construire des relations clients' = to build client relationships.
'Le/la critique gastronomique' = food critic. Restaurant evaluation vocabulary.
'Documenter les processus' = to document processes. Process documentation.
'L'organisateur/organisatrice d'événements' = event planner. Wedding planning vocabulary.
'Viser l'amélioration continue' = to strive for continuous improvement.
